skins.shipDescription: Erebus-class monitor ¨C Terror, Hull Number I03!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the second ship of the Erebus-class monitors. The Abercrombie-class ships are no match for me and my sister... We spent a lot of time in the Dardanelles strait. Bombardment missions... piece of cake.
skins.acquisition: Monitor ship... Terror... Abercrombie-class ships are no match for me and my sister... We spent a lot of time in the Dardanelles strait. Bombardment missions... piece of cake.
skins.login: Commander... I've been wanting to talk... to you... about...
skins.details: Your eyes look just like those weirdo' eyes, Commander...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, could you put away those peas? And the lawnmower¡­¡­
skins.secretaryIdle2: Is is that weird for me to have a 'heart'?

skins.shipDescription: I have to dress up as a ghost for Halloween, but I'm not very good at making complicated costumes... Is something like this okay?
skins.acquisition: I have to dress up as a ghost for Halloween, but I'm not very good at making complicated costumes... Is something like this okay?
skins.login: Boo! Scaring people... it's done like this, right?
skins.details: "From the depths of Sheol, I emerge from eternal slumber to claim your soul" ... This line sounds like something my sister would say.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I wanted to spend some time with my sister, but she doesn't seem to be interested in Halloween...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Today, everyone will be dressed up as monsters and witches, so I will fit in with them...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Children will ask for candy from adults... but Terror is no longer a child- Eh? Candy, for me? Thank you...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander's hand... is nice and warm...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If you keep touching, the bandages are going to come lose...
